snippet.title: Manafinder - Tokyo Game Show Trailer  (Turn-based RPG)
snippet.description:
Immerse yourself in this tale of drama and intrigue, hope and suffering, fantasy and morality. Explore the beautiful and fantastical world of Aevi, and fight your way against ferocious beasts and other threats in the quest for manastones as you define the fate of the exiled!

Wishlist Manafinder on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1582410/Manafinder/

Manafinder was part of this Tokyo Game Show 2021 Indie Game 'Selected Exhibit'!

Manafinder is a Japanese-style RPG with turn-based combat that emphasizes weapon selection and elemental affinities. 
Learn more about Manafinder: https://linktr.ee/manafinder 

#jrpg #tokyogameshow  #gaming
